TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ObjRef extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.IObjectReference, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class ObjRef Implements IObjectReference, ISerializable

summary.span: 存储生成代理以与远程对象通信所需的所有相关信息。

span.span: Stores all relevant information required to generate a proxy in order to communicate with a remote object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是扩展的对象的可序列化表示(MBR)。A is a serializable representation of an object that extends (MBR). A用于传输对象引用跨边界。A is used to transfer an object reference across a boundary. 创建的对象称为封送处理。Creating a for an object is known as marshaling. 你可以创建(封送) 是显式，通过注册 MBR 对象与远程处理基础结构 (请参阅和)，或隐式，通过调用远程时作为参数传递的 MBR 对象对象。You can create a (marshal a ) either explicitly, by registering the MBR object with the remoting infrastructure (see and ), or implicitly, by passing an MBR object as a parameter when calling a remote object. 远程处理使用对象来存储和传输有关的所有相关的信息正在进行远程处理。Remoting uses objects to store and transmit all the relevant information about the being remoted. 包含描述信息和类的对象被封送处理、 其确切位置和如何访问该对象所在的远程处理分支通信相关信息。The contains information that describes the and class of the object being marshaled, its exact location, and communication-related information on how to reach the remoting subdivision where the object is located. 类实现后封送，通过通道传输到另一个应用程序域，可能在另一个进程或计算机中表示的。After a class implementing is marshaled, the that represents it is transferred through a channel into another application domain, possibly in another process or computer. 当进行反序列化 (请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)) 在目标应用程序域中，它进行分析，以创建远程 MBR 对象透明代理。When the is deserialized (see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)) in the target application domain, it is parsed to create a transparent proxy for the remote MBR object. 此操作称为取消封送。This operation is known as unmarshaling. 透明代理是一个对象，提供实际对象驻留在客户端的空间的视觉效果。A transparent proxy is an object that provides the illusion that the actual object resides in the client's space. 它从而实现此目的转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其进行调用。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理是托管运行时类的类型的实例本身。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed run-time class of type . 实现透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 代理对象可在不考虑。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . 应用程序不需要区分代理引用和对象引用。Applications need not distinguish between proxy references and object references. 但是，处理问题，如激活的服务提供商，生命期管理和事务需要进行这种区分。However, service providers dealing with issues such as activation, lifetime management, and transactions need to make such distinctions. 此类，使链接要求，并且在类级别继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. A直接调用方或派生的类没有基础结构权限时，将引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[的继承需求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用自定义。The following code example demonstrates the use of a custom . 若要查看测试自定义该激活代码，请参阅示例方法。To view the activation code that tests the custom , see the example for the method. [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CreateObjRef2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef2/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the for the .
The interface for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前的属性将保存在过程中，活动通道由提供的信息时创建 (请参阅有关封送处理的详细信息)。The current property holds information contributed by active channels in the process, when the is created (see for details on marshaling). 此信息可以由其他进程或应用程序域中的通道，用于决定创建与当前实例所表示的对象进行通信的传输接收器。This information can be used by the channels in other processes or application domains to decide whether or not to create a transport sink to communicate with the object represented by the current instance. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前的属性包含当创建一个代理来表示对象时获取重新生成的序列化的消息的接收器链。The current property contains a serialized chain of message sinks that gets regenerated when a proxy is created to represent the object. 这适用于绑定的对象类型仅，并且表示提供事务等运行时服务的对象组。This is used for bound object types only, and represents the groups of objects that provide such run-time services as transactions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含有关由当前的远程对象的类型的详细的信息。 contains detailed information about the type of remote object represented by the current . 当前的属性包含类型层次结构以及该类型实现的接口的列表。The current property contains a list of interfaces that the type implements, as well as the type hierarchy. 此信息可能用于优化以增量方式要调整到的远程对象的类型的客户端的视图的代理。This information might be used to refine the proxy incrementally to adjust to the client's view of the remote object's type. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CreateObjRef#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CreateObjRef/CS/example.cs#1)]
